description: After the defeat of surrounding enemies, the heroes enter the battle worn fortress. Steve mentioned somebody was waiting, will they find that person?

parts.speaker: steverogers
parts.text: Sombra? SOMBRA?!

parts.speaker: steverogers
parts.text: Where in the world could she be...?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Sombra?

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: Ah yes, Sombra is our technician.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: And she's still somewhere in here? This place looks utterly abandoned...

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: THIS fortress is our home! It has the most advanced tech! Well, some floors...

parts.speaker: steverogers
parts.text: Sombraaaa!

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: What the hell is going on here?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Sombra? Oh my god I'm so glad to see you! Were you hiding or something?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Hiding from who? You? Logan?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: From the enemy that was occupying this fortress...?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: You....didn't know about the Apophis being here?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Apophis was here? Huh, no didn't notice a thing. I was up here doing my research and my usual things.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: That's... typical of you. But there are more alarming matters. Sombra.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Do you remember anything from before 4 days ago?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Huh....Hmmmm...now you mention it...No.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Well you see, we don't know either! And our new friend here, he doesn't as well. His memory is even shorter.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Let's see, we were summoned to the crossworld... We found this fortress and fought some enemies. Then... completely blank until 4 days ago.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: There seems to some kind of force at work. A powerful one. Extremely powerful.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Something or someone has created this void in our memories!

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Not only that but we somehow lost the rest of our squad. We have no idea where they are.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Oh, Logan, Jeniffer, Peter?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Yep, and the rest.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Oh, and might I ask who this is?

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Oh his name is $player, he's our newest member.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Pleasure to meet ya, $player!

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Pleasures all mine, Sombra.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: I think it's only fair to wait with this enigma and resume to normal schedule.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: I'm sure there are still enemies in the forest, behind the fortress.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: You know me cap, I ain't goin out there, ever. I am busy enough as is.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Yes, well, I wasn't expecting that of you either.

parts.speaker: sombra
parts.text: Good. Well I'm off boys, I have alot of renovating to do.

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: Tony, go check the inventory if there is anything left.

parts.speaker: tonystark
parts.text: On it.

parts.speaker: player
parts.text: $player, I want you to follow me. I'll show you around the fortress.
